Uses of Class
Appointment

    • Uses of Appointment in <Unnamed>

      Methods in <Unnamed> that return Appointment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Appointment AppointmentBook.findAndReturn(java.lang.String appointmentName)
      findAndReturn(String appointmentName) similar to find(Appointment appointmentToFind) except it will return the Appointment object if found.
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return types with arguments of type Appointment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> AppointmentBook.getAllAppointments()
      getAllAppointments() returns all the Appointment objects for the AppointmentBook object as an ArrayList.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> DatabaseCommunicator.GetAllAppointmentsFromDatabase(java.lang.String BookName)
      Method to fetch all Appointment records stored in the DB for a given AppointmentBook.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Appointment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int AppointmentBook.add(Appointment newAppointment)
      Adds a new Appointment object to the appointmentList maintained by the AppointmentBook class.
      static void DatabaseCommunicator.AddAppointmentToDatabase(java.lang.String tableName, Appointment appointment)
      Method to add a new entry into the DB representing an Appointment for a given AppointmentBook.
      int AppointmentBook.checkForTimeClash(Appointment appointmentToCheck)
      Check to see if the supplied Appointment object's times clash with an existing Appointment object.
      int AppointmentBook.find(Appointment appointmentToFind)
      find(Appointment appointmentToFind) searches through the AppointmentBook objects ArrayList of Appointment objects for one whose toString() output matches that of the supplied appointmentToFind's toString() output.
      static void DatabaseCommunicator.GetSpecificAppointmentFromDatabase(java.lang.String BookName, Appointment appointment)
      Method to return a specific Appointment record stored in the DB.
      boolean AppointmentBook.isInBook(Appointment appointmentToCheck)
      Method to check if an Appointment object exists in the AppointmentBook.
      void AppointmentBook.remove(Appointment appointmentToRemove)
      Checks if the Appointment object that wants to be removed exists in the current AppointmentBook and removes it if it does.
      static void DatabaseCommunicator.RemoveAppointmentFromDatabase(java.lang.String tableName, Appointment appointment)
      Method to remove a given Appointment record from an AppointmentBook table.
